title: Successful treatment of resistant hypertension and severe complications in a 63-year-old man with primary aldosteronism without adrenalectomy: A case report
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Ai Wang, Qun Ma, Muisha B. Mbikyo, Linlin Miao, Nan Cui, Haoran Fu, Jiahui Yu, Qiao Wu, Yingxian Sun, Zhao Li
